Hysterical Careers

Careers Available:

Social Media Assistant

Job Expectations include:

  • Scheduling and making posts about upcoming local shows.
  • Managing multiple social media accounts, such as twitter, instagram, and youtube.
  • Making engaging visuals and graphics for shows, such as posters.
  • Watching trends, popular comedians, and keeping social media content recent, and updated.

Shift Information: 20 hours a week, work from home preferred.


Stand-Up Show Manager

Job Expectations include:

  • Booking and planning for various comedians and sets.
  • Adjusting and themeing the venue for different events.
  • Communicating with and negotiating gigs with comedians directly.
  • Watching trends, popular comedians, and keeping social media content recent, and updated.

Shift Information: 35 hours a week, Monday-Friday, weekends as needed.
